data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Montreal needs to be cautious. Philadelphia have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 2, Attention is being given to Philadelphia’s Kacper Przybylko and play has been suspended briefly.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Montreal just outside Philadelphia's area.
In the minute 4, Kacper Przybylko has recovered and rejoins the match in Harrison.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mark McKenzie for Philadelphia who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Goal! Romell Quioto gives Montreal a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Montreal.
Mark McKenzie returns to the field for Philadelphia after picking up a slight injury.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Montreal.
In the minute 8, Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of Montreal.
In the minute 10, Saphir Taider of Montreal gets in a strike, but is off target.
Marcos De Oliveira awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
At Red Bull Arena, Montreal are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 12, In Harrison a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Philadelphia close to the penalty box.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Montreal are down to 10 men after Romell Quioto has been shown a red card.
Throw-in high up the field for Philadelphia in Harrison.
Marcos De Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Kacper Przybylko for Philadelphia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Montreal have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 21, Philadelphia have a dangerous throw-in.
Philadelphia are pushing forward but Brendan Aaronson's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 22, Goal! Alejandro Bedoya equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Andrew Wooten instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Montreal in the half of Philadelphia.
In the minute 28, Philadelphia's Andre Blake has been booked in Harrison.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Harrison to check on Orji Okwonkwo, who is grimacing with pain.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Harrison.
In the minute 31, Montreal's Orji Okwonkwo is back in action after a slight knock.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Harrison, Philadelphia push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Philadelphia are whistled for offside.
In the minute 37, Philadelphia's Alejandro Bedoya is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia surge into the attack at Red Bull Arena but Mark McKenzie’s header is off-target.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
Free kick Montreal.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 41, Marcos De Oliveira signals a Montreal throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
Can Montreal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Philadelphia's half?
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Red Bull Arena.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
Philadelphia advance rapidly upfield but Marcos De Oliveira blows for offside.
The first-half is over.
Goal! Philadelphia take a 1-2 lead through a well-placed header from Kacper Przybylko.
In the minute 45, Great play from Matt Real to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
The away team replace Warren Creavalle with Anthony Fontana.
Great finish from Kacper Przybylko to give Philadelphia a 1-3 lead.
In the minute 47, That's a fine assist from Brendan Aaronson.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 50, Marcos De Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Philadelphia are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Montreal in the half of Philadelphia.
In the minute 53, Montreal make their first substitution with Karifa Yao replacing Joel Waterman.
Anthony Fontana of Philadelphia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 55, Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Philadelphia push upfield but Marcos De Oliveira quickly pulls them for offside.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 58, Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Philadelphia.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Samuel Piette for Montreal drives towards goal at Red Bull Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 60, Lassi Lappalainen is replacing Bojan Krkic for the home team.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Montreal throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Philadelphia.
Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
Corner awarded to Montreal.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Montreal.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at Red Bull Arena.
Ilsinho is on a sub for Andrew Wooten for Philadelphia.
In the minute 65, Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
It's now 1-4 in Harrison as Anthony Fontana scores for Philadelphia.
Mark McKenzie with an assist there.
In the minute 68, Philadelphia's Anthony Fontana gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Montreal defender.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of Montreal.
In the minute 69, Philadelphia pushes forward through Kacper Przybylko, whose finish on goal is saved.
Marcos De Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
In the minute 72, Jim Curtin (Philadelphia) is making a third substitution, with Sergio Santos replacing Kacper Przybylko.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in Montreal.
Can Montreal capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jorge Luis Corrales is replacing Orji Okwonkwo for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 76, Victor Wanyama is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Victor Wanyama is back on the pitch.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Philadelphia in the half of Montreal.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Montreal's Saphir Taider gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
In Harrison a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Philadelphia's Ilsinho attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 83, Montreal have a goal kick.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Montreal drives forward and Lassi Lappalainen gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Montreal.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Montreal's half.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
In the minute 87, Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Jim Curtin is making the team's fourth substitution at Red Bull Arena with Jack de Vries replacing Brendan Aaronson.
The away team have replaced Alejandro Bedoya with Cole Turner. This is the fifth substitution made today by Jim Curtin.
In the minute 88, Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Montreal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Harrison.
In the minute 89, Marcos De Oliveira awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Marcos De Oliveira signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ilsinho (Philadelphia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Marcos De Oliveira.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-4.
